signals.Ask: Guarantee no price increases until contract expiry.
signals.Evidence: You're good till the contract renews, obviously because we signed it up in advance.

signals.Ask: Desire to test AI features before full implementation.
signals.Evidence: I think you're on the right track with getting the documents there.

signals.Ask: Require customization options for AI responses and workflows.
signals.Evidence: You can either upload documents as they are copy paste snippets or best responses that you want for like specific scenarios.

signals.Ask: Need a robust feedback loop for AI performance improvement.
signals.Evidence: Every agent that interacts with it can keep giving that feedback loop.

signals.Ask: Interest in tracking sentiment on incoming emails.
signals.Evidence: You can tweak it based on prompts.
